response.overview: I directed and produced this film, my first. This was the first major documentary about the Van Cliburn International Piano Competition ever produced.  It won: Gold Cindy - Information Film Producers of America, and a Bronze Award at the International Film and Television Festival of New York.  Cameramen: Richard Leacock and Richard Inman Pearce  Narration by the late, great Harry Miles Muheim. It was edited by Lisa Jackson. -- J. Mitchell Johnson
response.title: Contest to Carnegie Hall
